    • Uses of ResourceSpecification in entropy.configuration.resources

      Classes in entropy.configuration.resources that implement ResourceSpecification 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CPUConsSpecification
      CPU resource based on VirtualMachine.#getCPUConsumption() and Node.#getCPUCapacity().
      class  CPUCoresSpecification
      CPU resource, using only the number of nodes
      class  CPUReservationSpecification 
      class  GetterBasedSpecification
      resource specification based on the presence of GetterBasedSpecification.getCapacity(Node) and GetterBasedSpecification.getUse(VirtualMachine) methods
      class  MappedResourceSpecification 
      class  MemConsSpecification
      CPU resource based on VirtualMachine.#getMemoryConsumption() and Node.#getMemoryCapacity().
      class  MemReservationSpecification
